description:
At Rosen, Varsek & Rosen we understand how stressful and overwhelming a legal entanglement can be. We also understand that when you run into legal difficulties you need someone you can trust to handle all matters of your case as if it were their own. Your satisfaction with the outcome of your case is our consummate goal.

We offer a broad knowledge in all areas of the law. If you should find yourself facing misdemeanor or criminal charges, need representation in a divorce hearing or discrimination case, call Rosen, Varsek & Rosen for advice and legal representation you can count on.

Personal Injury & Accident Cases
Medical Neglect
Real Estate Law
Workers Compensation

Wills, Trust & Estates
Criminal Law

Don't face your legal battles alone. Call someone who's willing to fight for you. Call Rosen, Varsek & Rosen.
